
(k / know-01
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 m
      :condition (a / appear-01
            :ARG1 (m / man
                  :mod (l / little)
                  :ARG0-of (l2 / laugh-01)
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                        :ARG1 (h2 / hair
                              :mod (g / golden)))
                  :ARG0-of (r / refuse-01
                        :ARG1 (a2 / answer-01
                              :ARG1 (q / question-01))))
            :time (t / then)))
